Hero.title: Handcrafted silver jewelry that tells a story of elegance and tradition
Hero.description: Crafted by Salim artisans, each piece channels Javanese heritage into refined, modern elegance.

Introduction.title: The Art of Silver Craftsmanship
Introduction.description1: At Salim Silver, we believe that jewelry is more than just an accessory; it is an expression of art and tradition. Our pieces are handcrafted by skilled artisans in Kotagede, Yogyakarta, preserving a legacy of renewal and design.
Introduction.description2: From intricate filigree rings to bold statement necklaces, every item in our collection tells a unique story.

CTA.title: Custom Designs & Wholesale
CTA.description: Looking for a unique piece or interested in stocking our jewelry? We offer custom design services and wholesale partnerships.

Featured.title: Featured Collections
Featured.description: Explore our curated selection of handcrafted silver jewelry

card1.title: Handcrafted Rings
card1.description: Discover our collection of intricate silver rings, each piece telling a story of Javanese tradition.

card2.title: Artisan Necklaces
card2.description: Elegant silver necklaces featuring bold pendants and delicate chains, perfect for any occasion.

card3.title: Silver Bracelets
card3.description: Hand-woven and solid silver bracelets that combine modern style with timeless craftsmanship.

card4.title: Statement Earrings
card4.description: From subtle studs to dramatic drops, our earrings are designed to captivate and inspire.

Metadata.title: Handcrafted Javanese Silver Jewelry
Metadata.description: Explore Salim Silver's handcrafted rings, necklaces, and bracelets inspired by Javanese heritage and made in Kotagede, Yogyakarta.
